entry.title: Didn't think my first update for gmtk game jam would come this late but I also didn't expect to be stuck in a "loop" trying come up with a decent idea for 24 hours. Despite all that, we are making great progress and I can't wait for y'all to play with my
entry.content: Didn't think my first update for gmtk game jam would come this late but I also didn't expect to be stuck in a "loop" trying come up with a decent idea for 24 hours. Despite all that, we are making great progress and I can't wait for y'all to play with my

entry.title: Sorry for the lack of updates but I had to lock in to finsh GMTK Jam AND the Writing Battle. I was pretty exhausted so I had to rest afterwards but Im back! #indiedev #indiegames #gamedev
entry.content: Sorry for the lack of updates but I had to lock in to finsh GMTK Jam AND the Writing Battle. I was pretty exhausted so I had to rest afterwards but Im back! #indiedev #indiegames #gamedev

entry.title: I’m back to working on Herogotchi and I’m still figuring out how to tackle this post mortem for GMTK. I figure I at least share my results for GMTK and update yall on the status of the Writing Battle stuff. #gamedev #fyp #indiedev #gameboy

entry.content: I’ve been considering this for awhile. At the very least I am making a cart for myself, but I wouldn’t mind selling a few if people wanted. #gameboy #gamedev #indiedev #physicalmedia

entry.title: It’s time for another History the Asix and I got two games this time. Hunter Spade was a fun game to make, but Railroad Stuggle is in my top five. #gamedeveloper #indiedev #fyp #devlog
entry.content: It’s time for another History the Asix and I got two games this time. Hunter Spade was a fun game to make, but Railroad Stuggle is in my top five. #gamedeveloper #indiedev #fyp #devlog

entry.title: I’ve had this controller for almost five years. A lot of playtime was sunk into this controller. Tons of Smash Bros, games beaten, etc. Luckily Im expecting a new 8bitdo controller later this week so this was timely. #gaming #videogames #fyp
entry.content: I’ve had this controller for almost five years. A lot of playtime was sunk into this controller. Tons of Smash Bros, games beaten, etc. Luckily Im expecting a new 8bitdo controller later this week so this was timely. #gaming #videogames #fyp

entry.title: I finally decided to ascend in Cookie Clicker. I was at 20 sextillion cookies and I’m already at a few billion cookies…. Thats like almost 1% already 😃 #cookieclicker #gaming #fyp

entry.title: Herogotchi finally has a name! I’ve decided to call it Pilot Care and with that it was time to do a title screen so here’s a timelapse of that quick process. Should be playable in a few days. #gamedev #timelaspe #gameboy #pixelart #indiegames
entry.content: Herogotchi finally has a name! I’ve decided to call it Pilot Care and with that it was time to do a title screen so here’s a timelapse of that quick process. Should be playable in a few days. #gamedev #timelaspe #gameboy #pixelart #indiegames

entry.title: Here’s a timelapse of me making a quick little win screen for Pilot Care/Herogotchi in Resprite on my iPad. This and the title screen were fun to do. #pixelart #gameboy #gamedev #indiegames #indiedev
entry.content: Here’s a timelapse of me making a quick little win screen for Pilot Care/Herogotchi in Resprite on my iPad. This and the title screen were fun to do. #pixelart #gameboy #gamedev #indiegames #indiedev

entry.title: After about two-ish month Pilot Care (Herogotchi) is finished. I am equal parts exhausted and excited for it and I hope y’all have fun with it. Expect the post mortems to come after this. Also inputting a popular code on a specific screen will do a thing…
entry.content: After about two-ish month Pilot Care (Herogotchi) is finished. I am equal parts exhausted and excited for it and I hope y’all have fun with it. Expect the post mortems to come after this. Also inputting a popular code on a specific screen will do a thing…
